information: The maximum number of points is 350. Cross-check criterias:

criteria.text: The welcome page should contain general information about the developers, project, and course
In the upper right corner, there are 2 buttons: Sign In and Sign Up
If the login token is valid and unexpired, change the Sign In and Sign Up buttons to the 'Go to Main Page' button
When the token expires - the user should be redirected to the 'Welcome page' automatically
Pressing the Sign In / Sign up button redirects a user to the route with the Sign In / Sign up form

criteria.title: Sign In / Sign Up - max 50 points

criteria.text: Buttons for Sign In / Sign Up / Sign Out are everywhere where they should be
Client-side validation should be implemented
Upon successful login, the user should be redirected to the Main page
If the user is already logged in and tries to reach these routes, they should be redirected to the Main page
Working editor allowing to edit and prettify the query
Working documentation explorer, should be visible only when SDL request will succeed
Variables section; could be showed/closed
Header section; could be showed/closed
Response section; editor in read-only JSON viewer mode
Localization
Sticky header
Errors from the API side are displayed in the user-friendly format
React default favicon
The presence of errors and warnings in the console
The presence in the console of the results of the console.log execution
@ts-ignore or any usage (search through GitHub repo)
Making commits after the deadline
Absence of tests
Test coverage below 80%
Absence of linting
Absence of prettier
Absence of Husky git hooks
Usage of 3rd party / open-source libraries for prettifying, i18n
